title: Development and Application of Elementary Science Education Materials Using Adaptive Primary Literature

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A process of developing and evaluating science education materials applicable to actual classrooms through team-based collaborative learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners develop at least three APL (Adapted Primary Literature) materials that reorganize primary scientific literature into elementary education levels.
Learners create implementation plans to apply APL materials developed through PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects to actual classroom scenarios.
Learners improve APL materials to meet over 80% scientific accuracy and educational suitability through peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
